website_summaries.verdict: The Xperia Z3v marks Sony's triumphant return to Verizon, offering high-end specs and features without some of the compromises of its smartphone peers.
cons: On the thick and heavy side

website_summaries.verdict: The slender, long-lasting Sony Xperia Z3 appears iterative, but delivers one of the most roundly excellent Android experiences on T-Mobile and features exclusive PlayStation 4 game streaming capability.
The Sony Xperia Z3 Compact is the only high-end, smaller Android phone available in the U.S., but it's not without its flaws.
pros: Extremely powerful for a small phone

customer_reviews.title: This phone has never worked right since I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone has never worked right since I bought it in January. The phone came to me used I could tell by the scratches on the touch screen. The company tried to hide the scratches by putting a screen protector on it. The touch screen has never worked right and will glitch out every so often, and requires me to restart the phone. The top of the screen does not ever work, I have to switch to land scape view every time in need to select something at the top of the screen. IE quick settings or contacts. Do not buy from these people!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. I wish they still made them like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. I wish they still made them like this. Long battery lasts 2 days with regular use. If you don't care about playing the most hardware demanding games it'ss a great choice. Great for watching video. I wish it had a fingerprint lock button but that feature is on newer models (but this has the best battery which is more important). Call reception seems good if you have a good carrier that supports your band.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bojangles

customer_reviews.title: Very bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Had a really poor experience, I received phone that wasn't working proper. Never got a chance to turn on the screen, I couldn't get it to charge battery..
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Just don't break it.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best Android platform out there along with Z3+. Stellar standby time. Very attractive styling, almost iPhone-esque in attention to detail. Snappy processor. There's only one problem with this phone: If you break the glass you're SOL as replacement parts come from China, take forever and don't work half the time. If you break this phone, prepare to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir G.

customer_reviews.title: CAMERA WONT WORK PROPERLY.
customer_reviews.text: Received this Sony Experia Z3 in god order with all the described accesories, it turned on alright and everything was wrking properly until somehow the camera (which was one of the main reasons that I did the purchase ad changed from my Samsung S4 to the Experia Z3 looking for a better resolution and workability) stoped working and then it worked again but this time until now the camera wont focus correctly and only take blury pictures and video. Will try return the Experia z3 looking for a product exchange.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Phone. If your in USA and the carrier ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Phone.If your in USA and the carrier is T.mobile or At&t and looking for 4G LTE then go for this model. since the difference between the models like D6653 and 6D6603 is D6603 has 4G LTE 1700 Frequency,and D6653 doesn't hasve that frequency so it will get only 4G hsps+. Check carefully while buying sony xperia z3 phones in USA if you need 4G LTE.
customer_reviews.author: Bskr

customer_reviews.title: The phone has a problem. The screen is lifted ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone has a problem. The screen is lifted up by the right side and I guess it left the device NOT waterproof. I guess it came that way from factory. I can not return it to you cause after it arrived to US, it was sent to me to Venezuela. It's almost impossible for me to return it, besides it's International version so no warranty. Just to let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: This is not a D6603, it is a 6653, it will not work on at&t
customer_reviews.text: The system says it's a D6603 bit if you go to legal it says it's a 6653 which is not AT&T compatible, false advertisement
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: The model is great, but I got a defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: The device came with a broken back panel, and a bad battery connector. I bought it when spending a few days in Dallas, and by the time I realized the problem is more than just cosmetic I was already back in Israel and it was too late to return it. Right now I am waiting for parts so the phone could be fixed, it is not working because of the battery issue. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tsav

customer_reviews.title: Good for PS4 Remote Play
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great phone. The sole purpose for purchasing this phone was so that I can Remote Play my PS4. Gameplay is good but, unless you have a superb WiFi connection, it’s gonna be laggy & freeze every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Juan N

customer_reviews.title: The Phone broke after three days of use. It ...
customer_reviews.text: The Phone broke after three days of use. It got wet, but for less than 3 seconds after that, the screen went black. I was not able to fix it because there was no warranty on it, and Sony was not gonna take it in. I waisted almost $400 on a phone that didn't last me more than 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... break for no reason as well as doesn't work great with cell
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and no problem with buyer but the cellphone itself has very delicate glass backing which is known to break for no reason as well as doesn't work great with cell provider
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: NO WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: incredible , I've tested under walter (20cm) for 2 seconds, And the screen turned black and never worked again NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Javier M

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The back panel fell off after just a couple weeks. Used it for another two months and the screen cracked after a mild fall, even with a case. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery, great camera,
customer_reviews.text: My first smartphone in two years. It has a great battery life, lasts me almost all day with heavy use or almost two days with light use, the camera is great, not better than iphone, but with manual settings it can take great pictures. The skin on it is not too far from stock Android.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Known issues...
customer_reviews.text: If for some reason your touch screen stops working randomly you may want to try updating it via the companion app. It fixed all of the problems I had with the phone. I can log into the PlayStation apps and my phone is responding again. Only took me 2 months to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: even tho the phone said it was new,
customer_reviews.text: even tho the phone said it was new, I had problems with the batery and the tech told me it was refubrished and teh batery wasnt original
customer_reviews.author: Laura Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent SONY XPERIA Z3 D6603
customer_reviews.text: This SONY XPERIA Z3 D6603 is a super phone is very powerful the size is perfect for me and i'm from Costa Rica and it work like a charm
customer_reviews.author: David8508

customer_reviews.title: Good but not much
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone but I would prefer that it comes in a factory way. This XPERIA Z3 is an European version with some apps of its local provider (german) an its charger doesn't work without an adapter
customer_reviews.author: Kiko83

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Well-made by Sony
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Well-made by Sony. But, one problem - Display is super-easy to break. Compared to iphone, this has much more fragile display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, but the sound is so poor that I have sold it after a short time.
customer_reviews.author: El bacan

customer_reviews.title: great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Snappy performance, great battery life, great camera, and lolipop. Most of the bloatware is deletable w/out root. I'd highly recommend this device, especially at the pricepoint. Expandable memory via micro sd allows you to scale up more cheaply than with other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Phillips

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound and camera
customer_reviews.text: an stylish and superbphone, amazing sound and camera, great cellphone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Z3 D6603
customer_reviews.text: The product arrive in perfect condition but I bought a Z3 6603 and I received a 6613. This model has problems to update to newer version of Android.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Touch Screen does not work. That is terrible, I will never buy from this seller.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a fantastic phone!! i'm very happy. Super fast, confortable and powerfull

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, but my disappointment is that I get with the lid open

customer_reviews.title: The phone is not new. I want to return ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is not new. I want to return it. I have been cheated

customer_reviews.text: good afternoon I'm very annoyed by my cell That alone I run two months , send it to the company Sony and I was inreparable digeron by Lack of parts . I want my money back for it did not break nothing One day just any lit

customer_reviews.title: Camera great. Battery life best improvement
customer_reviews.text: Screen an improvement over the Z2. Is light but still feels elite. Camera great. Battery life best improvement.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: failure a week of use, so there is no guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed because if is supposed to be waterproof should not ...
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday I got the Z3 I buy here , today I decided to soak it in water, but when i remove and clean it, the screen began to flash and then completely darkened . the 2 caps were completely closed and now will not turn at all. I am disappointed because if is supposed to be waterproof should not get wet inside, I hope to get a respond as soon as possible to my complaint ... I'm very sad. :(
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Cabrales

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone.... Its a great upgrade from my Z1 Compact

customer_reviews.title: Battery drain and Vodafone rom
customer_reviews.text: Battery wont last one day and it comes with Vodafone rom.
customer_reviews.author: Franco H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone! Was delivered on time! Camera is the best i ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Ramon V.

customer_reviews.title: Lagging basic requirement of a mobile
customer_reviews.text: The phone lags the very basis functionality of a mobile. Listening to the other person while on a call is PATHETIC !!! Have to use a headphone or else you cant hear anything. Complained to sony about this and had to reset my phone and do a software update. Sony is asking to return this product for servicing, but I don't think I will be going for it. Checked in multiple forums and this seems to be a very common problem. Unbelievable that a flagship smart phone from sony is having such issues. If you can adjust with this then this phone is really good. What impresses me is the battery lift. It's Awesome. Really wish sony improve their products.
customer_reviews.author: Sumon Chattopadhyay

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice phone. The bad thing is that the third ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice phone. The bad thing is that the third time i've dropped it the glass broke.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Benedetto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best smartphone I have ever had. Fast, beautiful and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano Sacco

customer_reviews.title: The service was good but the phone didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The service was good but the phone didn't last long... I dropped the phone one time & the screen cracked and the mother board was damaged.. Sony Xperia is known to be a strong phone, very disappointing but believe it's because the phone is refurbished
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: According to the specifications, the cell resistant and works ...
customer_reviews.text: According to the specifications, the cell resistant and works under water. However, I put it into the water and the screen stoped working. The technical service tells me that water entered processor and my cellphone wasnt water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: best phone ive had so far
customer_reviews.text: best phone ive had so far... AMAZING battery life. went 3 full days without charging even if sony says 2 days. a bit bummed however that the back scratches quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: dino macharola

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing phone. Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing phone. Beautiful. Unlocked so it works with all carriers. Even the 4G works. 16 GB does seem a little small for a phone that records 4K. You will definitely need to buy an memory card for it if you want to get the most out of it. Also the glass on the back scratches pretty easily. Much easier than the front. So you will definitely want to put some kind of case on it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsel Khamidullin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! WORKS PERFECTLY WITH ATT LTE!
customer_reviews.text: Got this like a week ago. I bought the XPERIA Z3 6603 and works perfectly with ATT and gets LTE. No bloatware or anything from Tmobile like I've read in other reviews. First thing it did when i turned it on was download the new version of android (lollipop) so that was awesome. Love it! Everybody asks about my phone. Plus i added a 64 sd to it. Only bad thing is that they don't add the plug in adapter for the charger. It comes with the international one that doesn't work in the states. It came with a screen protector and one for the backside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila Flower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone for its time.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for its time. Had everything that newer phones have, just three years earlier. It is lacking a fingerprint sensor and wireless charging, but does have the magnetic charger. Great sound, great screen, water resistant, excellent camera, decent battery life. If it had the fingerprint and wireless charging option it would be the best phone for the price on the market, hands down. In fact, it might just be the best phone for the money still...only rival might be the Sony Xperia Z3 compact available on that big auction site competitor for about $150 delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Kevster

customer_reviews.title: I suggest to buy this item from  24hrs Deal seller.
customer_reviews.text: The item as described by the seller. It's new and you don't need to do anything. It comes with original screen protector film for front and rear. They gave me one more OTG cable. 4G work in usa. It's not any carrier network's logo and preloaded apps phone. Because I've got wrong with another two seller before. They sold vodafone version. But they have good communication and refund my money. I've spend extra money for two times return ship. So, choose my suggestion if you want to buy this phone. I don't want to talk about this phone any more. Because I'm sony crazy. This phone is excellent by the price.
customer_reviews.author: Van Cung

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is awfull. It never worked. It obviously is refurbished, although that is never specified on the description. Be carefull!!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Teran

customer_reviews.title: Not the unlocked version
customer_reviews.text: Received T mobile version! Too late to return, it was a gift for someone abroad to be opened later.
customer_reviews.author: David Horvath

customer_reviews.title: SHARING THE XPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: By far the best camera phone I have used to date. I came from an galaxy S3 and the camera quality and performance is amazing. Highly recommended for those that does a lot of outdoor activities and want to document their adventures. Many camera option to mess around with but your main function is probably super auto or manual. Best thing is that you can brave the element with peace in mind knowing that this phone is water resistant. Here's a video clip I capture with this phone that might be impossible with others
customer_reviews.author: greazly

customer_reviews.title: The phone is nice overall, camera is great and I think the ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work on my phone (T-Mobile). Not sure why. The phone is nice overall, camera is great and I think the quality of the phone is pretty good overall but for some reason was not allowing me to connect to any networks. I know it was not my SIM card because I tried it in different phones and it worked. I had to return the phone. Though based off reviews online that I have read it seems like my problem was uncommon.
customer_reviews.author: Patryk Rus

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, but wouldnt get updates & euro version
customer_reviews.text: This is the euro version, at least the one I got was (came with euro ac adapter, seller tossed in a cheap adapter). Also, package was obviously opened and likely not new (though no visible issues). Lollipop was released for this while I had it and I kept it for weeks, trying to get that update but even plugging it in to a PC, still wouldn't pull the update. Seemed to be because of the version it was.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: this is a beautiful phone, although very fragile with the glass front ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful phone, although very fragile with the glass front and back panels. Make sure to get a case and screen protector. I even got the lanyard to make sure that your phone stays safe.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: False description. Not unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: Came locked. Haven't been able to use because of that. Hate the service and customer attention. Won't ever buy again here.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: the xperia interface is simple and pretty. battery life is long
customer_reviews.text: the xperia interface is simple and pretty. battery life is long, as expected. phone was at 3%, didn't charge for two days idle, and it was still at 3%. crazy endurance. took a while to connect to 4G network on my carrier (AT&T) at first, but it works. had to google. phone is absolutely gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Known issue with top speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, this is the first non samsung android phone I got. The reason why I'm posting a bad review it's because the phone has a known issue with the upper speaker, mine died after less than two weeks of use. Sony's customer service is as bad as the seller's will to understand and solve the problem. I've read a lot of posts in many forums regarding this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Rolón

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but i guess they missed the meaning of ...
customer_reviews.text: Good phone but i guess they missed the meaning of being waterproof. Got wet, screen went blank and hasn't worked since then. Had to buy a new phone. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie I.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Worked perfectly with the international SIM card ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Worked perfectly with the international SIM card in South America. Received on time and in good condition. The only catch is the charger is designed for British plugs
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Mc

customer_reviews.title: Not a new phone. Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a new version. In the page it says, new, but the phone is refurbished, not new, in my case backpanel is opened (probably for battery replace)
customer_reviews.author: Kostya K.

customer_reviews.title: Sony rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever! I changed my One Plus One with this beauty, it has the quality of an Apple product with the benefits of Android, also Sony apps make experience better, Cybershot camera is awesome and PS4 apps are great! Sony for life!
customer_reviews.author: JC Asch

customer_reviews.title: fake headphones
customer_reviews.text: all is ok with the device but i really hates the headphone that comes with it, after see some reviews on internet there are not the headphone that usually come in the box
customer_reviews.author: fxuser

customer_reviews.title: Not working good for me
customer_reviews.text: Not working good for me, People can't listen properly and 1 month later the cam is not working as it did before... Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, fast good battery life and screen is exceptional
customer_reviews.author: L. Ari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: screem very bad quality and one die pixel on it, send it back
customer_reviews.author: Martin D.

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from HTC One M7
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Amazing build quality -Great battery life -Easy to use UI -Stereo speakers clear and loud Cons: -Front facing camera is noticeably grainy -Main camera does poor in low light settings
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Gamiz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Z3 is amazing.. I highly recommend it to anyone interested getting a smart phone..
customer_reviews.author: douglas mugisha

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a phone! Love everything about it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a phone! Love everything about it. My wife and I had the HTC One (M7) which we both loved... until mine fell in the water and that was that. The XPERIA Z3 is Super fast, bright screen, awesome battery life, clean Sony UI, best camera I've ever had on a phone with unique features, sleek and sophisticated design, magnetic charger is cool, and totally waterproof takes my worries away (I'm always near water on boat, beach, pool, etc) Love this phone so much I will get another for my wife (she got jealous).
customer_reviews.author: E.W.N.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I lost all my data due to "software error" and other problems
customer_reviews.author: BRUKE

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Nice screen, feels good in the hand. If you're an AT&T user, DO NOT let them change your IMEI number or you can't use LTE. they switched it back pretty easy for me. The seller gives a European to US outlet adapter in the box, so the seal is broken, but everything you need is there. Don't hesitate to buy, it's a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Levi R

customer_reviews.title: awesome phone. bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: phone is good. NOT factory unlocked! not only did it come with the operator (german Telekom) bloatware, it actually came with protective stickers pre- adhered.. I do not appreciate that service.. felt like I might as well have bought it second hand on a street corner,, phone-5 stars. It's my favorite. purchase experience -1star
customer_reviews.author: pb Floyd

customer_reviews.title: The phone is not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, the phone is amazing, and I love it. The problem is, the seller is not giving accurate information. Specifically that the phone is not compatible with the AT&T network ( therefore not truly unlocked. ) I have only written this review after already returning a previous xperia z3 that did the same thing, and this one faired no better. I have contacted the seller about this issue, maybe I have to do some wizardry to make it work for AT&T. If I get a response that makes the phone work, I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Kles

customer_reviews.title: Will not update!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to run Android KitKat buy this phone. There is NO current android updates because this is a phone from a region that doesn't allow it. Waste of time and money. Great phone if you like android from 5 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is in excellent condition, however, I was assured that includes ear phones, this is not true.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Morales

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely satisfied with my previous Sony phones which I owned Xperia play, Z1, and Z Ultra.
customer_reviews.author: Remini

customer_reviews.title: NOT Sony Z3, it's the Japanese Docomo Z3
customer_reviews.text: Not a UK Sony Z3 Compact. It's a Japanese Docomo Z3 Compact that has had the D6653 firmware removed and the international D6603 installed, which stops the NFC from working! The NFC chip stays on but is unusable, which makes the battery drain quicker. UK apps do not work on it either!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Davies

customer_reviews.title: no signal available
customer_reviews.text: had this phone now a couple of months and have to say the mobile signal is rubbish, I can only imagine the antenna is very poor quality, rarely can I get more than 2 bars and most of the time the phone just doesn't work. All other items have been fine, but principally the mobile was bought for phone use and for this its very poor. We have tested it against other mobiles on the same network and its truly below power. all in all very poor and I would strongly advise not considering this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Is Amazon really the right place to buy electronics now ?
customer_reviews.text: The most unreliable phone I have ever had. Screen very easily damaged, buttons don't always work and now the really common problem of the headphone socket not working has happened. DO NOT BUY this phone, Sony really missed the boat with this. Back to iPhone. Supplier GB Buddy not any help either - avoid them. Even though within warranty they ignore their contractual obligations. Not worth bothering with. Makes me wonder if Amazon is the right place to buy electronics at all now.
customer_reviews.author: Slartty

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ive had
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I had ever bought. I bought this online a few years back, it lasted me a very long time and I never had a fault or a problem with the phone and I used it everyday. The battery life could last for a day or two depending on the apps used. The only reason I no longer have it now was due to a smashed screen and it has been a problem to find a replacement. Otherwise I would buy this phone again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I've had this phone now for 4 years and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Had it for ages, I still love it. The last good Sony phone in my opinion, been meaning to upgrade and I like Sony phones but none have taken my fancy in years. The only downside to this phone is it does get quite hot when doing things like video and camera and occasionally does restart or freeze because of it. Also the charging port became super loose so I never got to use it underwater in case of the broken seal. Eventually I just ripped off the cover because it was constantly dangling!
customer_reviews.author: Kellalizard

customer_reviews.title: Faulty phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed whit the phone bassicly you can't do anything whit it , does not connect to internet no Google play nothing you can use the phone only to talk at it nothing else I'm sure I'm not gonna buy phones from Amazon again as is the first phone and it's a faulty one i usually don't leave feedbacks but as a didn't had a problem until not whit Amazon items as a ori.e member for over 2 years I'm very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hand size phone that is good at its job
customer_reviews.text: I find the phone a handy size, unlike some that are nearly as big as tablets. I am still coming to grips with some of the facilities. An excellent clear screen, although not too good in bright sunlight. A big improvement on my galaxy ace 2. Delivery was ahead of schedule, so full marks on that. The down side I find is the covers for the ports will not stand up to harsh wear & tear & are quite liable to break off. I took the precaution of getting a magnetic charger so that I don't have to keep opening the charging port (would recommend one). Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant phone - an upgrade from an Xperia M Definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant phone - an upgrade from an Xperia M Definitely worth the dolla. Great features, sharp clear screen (with good brightness settings - say if you're checking something in the middle of the night and you don't want your retinas burnt) Super fast, I've not had any problems with the phone itself at all (just the apps) It's got a great camera and super sharp video recording (full HD) I would say if you're looking for an upgrade, this is a phone you won't be disappointed with. Also, waterproof! Because, why not?
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcleod

customer_reviews.title: microphone must be out of place as everyone i've called from this phone has said it sounds like the phone is still in my pocket while I ...
customer_reviews.text: This refurbishment has either been put together with shoddy parts or incorrectly rebuilt. The charging led is dimmer than it should be, the speaker is blown, microphone must be out of place as everyone i've called from this phone has said it sounds like the phone is still in my pocket while I am talking, it is no longer waterproof which is one of the defining feature of this model.. And lastly in the last few days the touch screen has started playing up, seeing as i've had this phone approximately 2 weeks and paid over £120 for this i'm deeply dissatisfied. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TDilloway

customer_reviews.title: Simple the BEST.
customer_reviews.text: Received my brand new Xperia Z3 and only i can say is incredible device absolute high premium smartphone. High quality premium device,light,solid and very comfortable using in your hands. Gorgeous outstanding screen with very high contrast and very high level of brightness-must have device with country with most of the year sanny condition. Excellent battery life with normal use you get 2 days without having to worry of charging. Everything is super smooth and total experience is very high with the device. Call quality is excellent, wireless wifi,Bluetooth,GPS also perfect condition. Sound quality from the stereo speakers very good level Overall great job from Sony and also I have to mention excellent after sales support from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great, but hugely let down by the headphone socket
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for 3 years now and it's been great - it's survived being dropped in seawater and fresh, it's survived drops on the ground (albeit wearing a silicon cover) and I've never had any software or battery issues. Unfortunately though, this phone is hugely let down by the headphone socket. I've previously had to get it reaired three times now - a testament to how much I like this phone, but it's recently broken down again so I'm looking around for something else. Such a shame, if not for this issue the phone would be perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I did contact Sony direct who were worse than useless in that they denied there was any ...
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review having returned the product. Incidentally, worth mentioning how absolutely fabulous Amazon were. The phone factory reset itself twice losing me valuable data. It turns out that this is a known issue and as such frankly the product is not fit for purpose. I did contact Sony direct who were worse than useless in that they denied there was any such issue even after I had supplied them with internet threads setting out the number of people experiencing the same issue. Should anyone from Sony read this - please be assured you have lost a consumer completely, I will never buy another one of your products.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: After being with Apple for 8 years, I decided to make the switch over to Android. At first, it's all very daunting. But the more time you spend with it, the more you start to like it. The screen is amazing and there are plenty of different ways to customise the phone to your taste. The best thing for me though, is the fact that it's a sub 5" phone that fits perfectly in your hand, and doesn't compromise it's features, speed, or power, too much. I would definitely recommend this phone to others.
customer_reviews.author: jujuman10

customer_reviews.title: I'd get something else...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad phone but Sony doesn't make an update for the latest version of Android for the z3, it gets very hot when playing games or watching videos, it's quote slow when playing games or if you have a few apps open. Decent camera with slow Mo. If I could go back in time would I still buy it? No, I'd definitely go for a different phone that Sony still makes android updates for and doesn't try to melt itself while you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Still working great on 2020
customer_reviews.text: Even now on the year of 2020 I think this device does everything it's supposed to. I purchased this as used, but I believe it has been untouched all these years in a warehouse. Condition was scratch free, but I had to Google how to bring the battery to life - it had drained to the point of not responding to charger. Now it's up and running, flawless. Size wise this was the only option with iPhone SE, that I would accept (as we all know, everything is +6 images phablet size there days). Waiting for the new foldable screen devices to come down in size and price, include a 3.5mm jacket and microSD slot...
customer_reviews.author: Lasse Lignell

customer_reviews.title: The best phone I've owned - Fantastic battery life, waterproof and a perfect size for real use.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've owned. It's really fast, waterproof, a great size to hold an use and the preloaded Sony music software genuinely improves the sound - even when used with Google Play Music. And the battery life is fantastic - the first phone I've owned that can be used as a satnav for a normal journey without needing to be charged by the time you arrive at the other end. My only complaint is that Sony could have been less tight and included a magnetic charging connector for their clever charging port - but you can easily buy these on Amazon for £10.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: Pro: - Small screen size - Good battery - Frequent enough android updates - Powerful processor, never had issues with speed Neutral - Glass back, some may find it aesthetic, but it is prone to shattering. Con: - Headphone jack broke after about 3 months. This is a common problem with this phone. - Cover protecting charging port broke after a few months and now is no longer water proof and will open unexpectedly - Battery doesn't last as long after a year, although still does last about 3/4s of a day with above average use.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Darley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: In terms of functionality this phone is brilliant. I really like the design, the size and Sony's Android skin isn't too bad either. However the glass used on the screen is very very fragile, and there are many reports of fractures without cause over the web. I am currently in the return/repair process myself and hope to have it fixed as a manufacturing defect as there has been no impact or drop to cause this. Sony have admitted this issue on previous phones like the Z1 but currently claim there is no issue on the Z3/C but reports on the web say otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Hayter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone!
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent!! I upgraded from a Nexus 4 then a Nexus 5 and after the screen died on the Nexus 5 was after a replacement. The same goes for my review of the Z3 Compact tablet...it's upgradeable to Lollipop and hopefully Sony will keep updating it. It's also nice to get such a powerful compact phone, most manufacturers lower the spec of everything, with Sony it's just the screen size. Again: - Very fast, smooth - Great screen - microSD card slot Negatives - A bit slippy with being glass on both sides - Sony apps are uninstallable But highly recommended if you like your phones this size :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul S (probedb)

customer_reviews.title: The Sony is much much better than the iPhone 6 in terms of features and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality phone. A few niggles make me miss the IOS on my old apple iPhone. But I don't plan to go back too soon though. The Sony is much much better than the iPhone 6 in terms of features and power.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and the battery does last for a really long time. Only thing that I don't like is that when you take videos it wiggles a lot and the image stabilization feature does not seem to help. Other than that it is great hardware. Haven't tried to dip it in water yet but everything else works at it should. Wish it was android stock but the software overlay that Sony puts on it it's not actually that bad, much better than Samsung phones anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: very pleased to find no marks
customer_reviews.text: I received the Z3 well packed and an early due date (dead chuffed) opened the package expecting to find a couple of marks/scruffs, very pleased to find no marks, not thinging, just like a brand new one at half the price ,( who's a lucky boy then) works a treat. Thank you very much indeed. EJ
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jessop

customer_reviews.title: New phone? Questionable.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way that this is a new phone. The glass broke just being in my pocket after a week. I got a replacement screen, but when opening the device to change it, there were no screws keeping the main circuit board to the housing. All the videos on the internet show these screws being removed so I can’t believe that Sony forgot to put them in when making it. Because of the screen braking, I can’t return it. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Egan

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone, as my previous smart phone was a little big for my needs. After using this for the past month or so, I have to say that I very few issues with it. I have to be a fairly persistent when using the swipe to unlock the screen, and I was a bit disappointed that I'm not able to block certain telephone numbers. However this doesn't I still enjoy using this phone very much, and would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: A very solid device...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Really fast, battery life is amazing - the two days are not a marketing lie. Display is great, waterproofing works well, and the noise cancelling feature is simply mind blowing. Camera is amazing in low light, although sometimes it's a hit or miss. Overall, that's my second Xperia device ( previously had Xperia Z and iPhone 6 which I returned after a week ) and I know I will stick with Sony for a long time. Also, if you have PS4, you will enjoy playing PS4 games on your phone in your garden, bed or even bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Anderson

customer_reviews.title: who was extremely happy with the phone
customer_reviews.text: this purchase was for our 14 year old kid, who was extremely happy with the phone, still is, week later. I held the phone myself too, it's a beautiful device really, he's been on it ever since he took it out the box, he connected it to his bravia tv, and his ps4, he plays his ps4 games on it too, battery lasts whole day on full charge coz he's still on it most of time, he says it does feel warm in hand at back of phone though, probably because he holds it for long time, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha
